OOC: Rodimus is still waiting to recieve a antidote to a rust plague that is outside the Maximal base right now. After Wheeljack gives him it, he'll get to Prime's position quickly.
 thedachande1985 <thedachande1985@...> wrote:Optimus Prime:

     He smiled as they both returned his call. Now the waiting 
began...

     Just then he felt a pang in his chest. At first, he thought it 
was a bit of Magnus reaching out again. But he was wrong. The 
goodness inside of Prime was still trying to take hold of him.
     Prime sat down on the ground, his black shape crouching as he 
reached inside his own mind.

     In the CPU of Optimus Prime a battle was waged. Standing across 
from the dark and evil Optimus was the original Optimus Prime. He had 
no weapons on him, and had his hands out, as a symbol of truce.
     "We both know this isn't how you want to be," Good Prime 
said. "Please, just let me back in, we can join the Maximals, help 
them win the fight. Please."
     "I think you used this phrase once," Evil Prime said. "'One 
Shall stand'," Evil Prime pulled out his 'Big Gun' and blew away Good 
Prime, there was nothing left, "'and One shall fall.'"
     With that, Evil Prime was able to return to his own body, where 
(if you don't mind me saying) Both Rodimus and Hydra were waiting for 
him.

OOC: PS: This is just so I don't have to make more posts saying that 
he has to still wait and all. So it takes a bit of time here, but 
it's easier for you too. You could say you get there as Prime is 
awakening. That's be cool.
